item.description:
Julie and I have reserved Sites 12 and 13 at Sugarloaf II Campground on Zealand Rd, for a weekend of camping and hiking. Anyone who wants to join us there is welcome. A chance to meet some of your fellow NEHM members. With the 2 sites, we should have space for 4 tents, maybe more depending on size & creativity.

This location is great for hikers and bikers with many trails and paths nearby. I don't yet know where I'll be hiking on Sunday (or Saturday), I'll decide later. Julie has scheduled hikes for Mt Willard on Saturday and Arethusa Falls on Sunday, check the calendar.

Online reservations for Sugarloaf II have to be made at least 7 days in advance and there are only a few reservable sites left. We are reserved for both Friday night and Saturday, though I've only put the event on the calendar for Saturday night.
item.name: Camp and Hike White Mountains
